```{r}
#|label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```


```{r}
nyc_tracts<-read_csv("data/nyc_tracts.csv",show_col_types=FALSE)

nyc_tracts|>drop_na()|>ggplot(aes(x=med_income,y=race,color=med_income))+
  geom_beeswarm(alpha = 0.7, size = 2)+
  scale_x_continuous(labels=scales::dollar_format())
  labs(title = "Household income distribution by largest racial/ethnic group",
       subtitle = "Census tracts, New York City",
       x = "Median household income",
       y = "Largest group in Census tract",
       caption = "Data source: 2016-2020 ACS")+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
    legend.position = "none"
  )

```
